donate.title: Supports
donate.desc:
**Vote!** Support leaving your vote in [top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/517786947171909643 "Top.gg") remember that you can vote every 12 hours.
**Direct donations.** You can donate to our [PayPal](https://www.paypal.me/czemtb) or you will have to contact us on the support server.
**Promoting the bot.** There is to be known everywhere.
**Making...** guides, videos, writing texts, etc. on how to use the bot. StarLight needs everyone's help.
**Writing Code.** If you know programming, you may want to share code to continue implementing new things.

release.title: News from
release.descripcion:
:sparkles: **__New__**
**- AuditLogs:** The records were created with two modes, only important and normal. 
In the first, the following will be recorded:
    `-` When a user's profile is deleted.
    `-` When someone or everyone's economy is reset.
    `-` When money is removed or added with` addmoney`, `deletemoney` or` setmoney`
    `-` An item is created or deleted.
    `-` A user is locked or unlocked.
    `-` Items are removed from someone's or everyone's inventory.
    `-` When they buy an item
    `-` When transferring money or an item to another user.
In the second, all of the above will be recorded, plus the following:
    `-` When an item is edited
    `-` An item is won with the`loot` command
    `-` An item is sold or used.
    `-` When you win or lose money with `crime`, `daily`, `dice`, `flipcoin`, `rob`, `slotmachine`, `trade` and `work`.
**- SetAuditlogs:** Set the channel where the logs will be sent, use `--onlyImportant` to send only what is important.
**- DeleteAuditLogs:** Delete the configuration and webhoock from the logs.
**- AutoDelete:** Deletes a user's profile when banned from the server.
**- EditItem:** Now you can edit the position of the items with the ** changeposition ** property followed by the desired position.

:recycle: **__Changes__**
**- EditItem:** Now when editing an item, it will not change position by changing other values â€‹â€‹that are not * changeposition *.
**- Code:** DJS version, language system and SlashCommands changed.

:bug: **__Fixes__**
**- Top:** The top was not shown, it said * undefined * in tops under 11 users.
**- ItemInfo:** The command was not displayed when using it.
**- Buy:** Sometimes, I wouldn't let you buy items.
**- ResetEconomy:** It did not show the confirmation message.
**- It says:** The command did not work without being configured correctly.
**- SloMachine:** The command did not work several times.
release.footer: These are the changes of the version {{version}} any problem you can enter the support server. | Developed by {{dev}}.
